[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [MapRenderingManager](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.md)

## MapRenderingManager class

The implementation of \[\[IMapRenderingManager\]\] to instantiate in \[\[MapView\]\] and manage the map rendering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MapRenderingManager implements IMapRenderingManager 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(width, height, lowResPixelRatio, antialiasSettings)](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager._constructor_.md) |  | The constructor of <code>MapRenderingManager</code>. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [bloom](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.bloom.md) |  | { enabled: boolean; strength: number; radius: number; threshold: number; } |  |
|  [dynamicMsaaSamplingLevel](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.dynamicmsaasamplinglevel.md) |  | [MSAASampling](./harp-mapview.msaasampling.md) | Return the sampling level defined during continuous rendering. |
|  [lowResPixelRatio](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.lowrespixelratio.md) |  | number \| undefined | The <code>lowResPixelRatio</code> determines the resolution of the internal <code>WebGLRenderTarget</code>. Values between 0.5 and <code>window.devicePixelRatio</code> can be tried to give good results. A value of <code>undefined</code> disables the low res render pass. The value should not be larger than <code>window.devicePixelRatio</code>. |
|  [msaaEnabled](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.msaaenabled.md) |  | boolean | Return whether the MSAA is enabled. |
|  [outline](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.outline.md) |  | { enabled: boolean; thickness: number; color: string; ghostExtrudedPolygons: boolean; needsUpdate: boolean; } |  |
|  [sepia](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.sepia.md) |  | { enabled: boolean; amount: number; } |  |
|  [staticMsaaSamplingLevel](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.staticmsaasamplinglevel.md) |  | [MSAASampling](./harp-mapview.msaasampling.md) | Return the sampling level defined for rendering static frames. |
|  [vignette](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.vignette.md) |  | { enabled: boolean; offset: number; darkness: number; } |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [render(renderer, scene, camera, isStaticFrame)](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.render.md) |  | The method to call to render the map with the <code>MapRenderingManager</code> instance. It contains the chain of sub-passes that can transfer the write and read buffers, and other sheer rendering conditions as disabling AA when a high DPI device is in use. |
|  [setSize(width, height)](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.setsize.md) |  | The resize function to call on resize events to resize the render targets. It shall include the resize methods of all the sub-passes used in <code>MapRenderingManager</code>. |
|  [updateOutline(options)](./harp-mapview.maprenderingmanager.updateoutline.md) |  |  |
